name: Codename: Tortoise
description:
CODENAME:TORTOISE

Prototype in development for a tower defense game where enemies can only be delayed!
Play as a farmer protecting their lettuce from swarms of oncoming tortoise by flipping them, dropping decoy food, and spooking them to try and outlast the clock. 

 I intend to revist this project to add more levels and animate the player, so watch this space!

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:

Download the file, unzip, and run the .exe file

Enjoy!
